title: Command Performance
description: Super sexy Bridget and her equally hot friends have the whole summer ahead of them. Home from college and living in the lap of luxury in her new Stepfather's house, things were definitely looking up.  When her equally hot new step-brother Thomas catches her eye and falls into her well laid trap, both she and he are in for the summer of their lives.  Enjoy this tale of teasing, forced CFNM, hot foot action and light femdom as Thomas gets caught in Bridget's web and is forced into a Command Performance he will never forget!
author: M.V. Gaius
